TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MuxLogger extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.INodeLogger
type MuxLogger = class interface INodeLogger interface ILogger

summary.span: 这是一个多路复用记录器。

span.span: This is a multiplexing logger.

summary.span: 此记录器的用途是允许在生成过程中注册和注销多个记录器。

span.span: The purpose of this logger is to allow the registration and deregistration of multiple loggers during the build.

summary.span: 这是为了支持 VS IDE 方案，其中为每个项目系统的生成请求注册和注销记录器。

span.span: This is to support the VS IDE scenario where loggers are registered and unregistered for each project system's build request.

summary.span: 这意味着一个物理生成可能有多个每个逻辑生成，每个都具有自己的记录器集。

span.span: This means one physical build may have multiple logical builds each with their own set of loggers.

summary.span: Mux 记录器会将其自身注册为生成管理器，作为常规中部/l 样式记录器。

span.span: The Mux logger will register itself with the build manager as a regular central /l style logger.

summary.span: 它负责接收来自生成管理器的消息，并根据消息来自的逻辑生成将消息路由到正确的记录器。

span.span: It will be responsible for receiving messages from the build manager and route them to the correct logger based on the logical build the message came from.

summary.span: 要求： 1) 多路复用记录器将在生成管理器的开始生成之前注册在生成管理器实际开始生成之前注册的任何记录器，并在生成管理器启动生成后，将生成 "生成已启动" 事件，该事件在生成管理器启动后，将会收到 "生成已启动" 事件。

span.span: Requirements: 1) Multiplexing logger will be registered at the beginning of the build manager's Begin build Any loggers registered before the build manager actually started building will get the build started event at the same time as the MUX logger Any loggers registered after the build manager starts the build will get a synthesised build started event.

summary.span: 无法缓存事件，因为在创建事件时确定生成已启动事件的时间戳，因此缓存事件会在注册到 MUX 的记录器中产生错误的生成时间。

span.span: The event cannot be cached because the timestamp of the build started event is determined when the event is created, caching the event would give incorrect build times in the loggers registered to the MUX.

summary.span: 2) 将由生成管理器初始化 MUX 记录器。

span.span: 2) The MUX logger will be initialized by the build manager.

summary.span: Mux 将从生成管理器侦听事件源中的所有事件，并将事件正确路由到已注册的记录器。

span.span: The mux will listen to all events on the event source from the build manager and will route events correctly to the registered loggers.

summary.span: 3) 在结束生成中完成生成时，MUX 记录器将关闭。

span.span: 3) The MUX logger will be shutdown when the build is finished in end build .

summary.span: 此时，它将取消注册附加到它的所有记录器。

span.span: At this time it will un-register any loggers attached to it.

summary.span: 4) 在为每个记录器显示第一个项目 "已启动" 事件的 "项目已完成" 事件时，MUX 记录器将记录 "生成完成" 事件。

span.span: 4) The MUX logger will log the build finished event when the project finished event for the first project started event is seen for each logger.

summary.span: 正在注册记录器：

span.span: Registering Loggers:

summary.span: 多路复用记录器的工作方式如下：将使用提交 ID 将记录器传递到 MUX 注册记录器方法，该 ID 用于将消息路由到正确的记录器。

span.span: The multiplexing logger will function in the following way: A logger will be passed to the MUX Register logger method with a submission ID which will be used to route a the message to the correct logger.

summary.span: 将创建一个新的事件源，以便在已记录生成已启动事件时，可以将传入的记录器注册到该事件源。 MUX 记录器会创建一个新的 BuildStartedEvent 并将其发送到事件源。

span.span: A new event source will be created so that the logger passed in can be registered to that event source If the build started event has already been logged the MUX logger will create a new BuildStartedEvent and send that to the event source.

summary.span: UnregisterLoggers：生成提交完成后，将使用提交 ID 调用 UnregisterLoggers 方法。

span.span: UnregisterLoggers: When a build submission is completed the UnregisterLoggers method will be called with the submission ID.

summary.span: 此时，我们将查找提交 ID 的项目已完成事件的成功状态，并将生成完成事件记录到记录器。

span.span: At this point we will look up the success state of the project finished event for the submission ID and log a build finished event to the logger.

summary.span: 将清理事件源。

span.span: The event source will be cleaned up.

summary.span: 这可能很有趣，因为取消注册操作将来自执行日志记录的其他线程。

span.span: This may be interesting because the unregister will come from a thread other than what is doing the logging.

summary.span: 如果在记录事件时调用了 "注销"，这可能会导致同步问题。

span.span: This may create a Synchronization issue, if unregister is called while events are being logged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MuxLogger`一般函数如下所示：The `MuxLogger` generally functions as follows: - 在 `MuxLogger` 生成管理器的开始生成时注册。The `MuxLogger` is registered at the beginning of the build manager's Begin build. 在生成管理器启动生成之前注册的任何记录器都将以与相同的时间获取生成启动事件 `MuxLogger` 。Any loggers registered before the build manager starts the build get the build-started event at the same time as the `MuxLogger`. 生成管理器启动生成后注册的任何记录器都将获取合成生成启动事件。Any loggers registered after the build manager starts the build get a synthesized build-started event. 无法缓存事件，因为在创建事件时确定了生成启动事件的时间戳，而缓存事件会在注册到的记录器中产生错误的生成时间 `MuxLogger` 。The event cannot be cached because the timestamp of the build-started event is determined when the event is created, and caching the event would give incorrect build times in the loggers registered to the `MuxLogger`. - `MuxLogger`由生成管理器初始化The `MuxLogger` is initialized by the build manager `MuxLogger`从生成管理器侦听来自事件源的所有事件，并将事件正确路由到已注册的记录器。The `MuxLogger` listens to all events on the event source from the build manager and routes events correctly to the registered loggers. - `MuxLogger`当生成在结束生成中完成时，将关闭。The `MuxLogger` is shutdown when the build is finished in end build. 此时，它会取消注册附加到它的所有记录器。At this time, it unregisters any loggers attached to it. - 为 `MuxLogger` 每个记录器显示第一个项目开始事件的项目完成事件时，将记录生成完成事件。The `MuxLogger` logs the build-finished event when the project-finished event for the first project-started event is seen for each logger. `MuxLogger`注册记录器的方法如下：The `MuxLogger` registers loggers in the following way: 1. 记录器传递给 `MuxLogger.RegisterLogger` 方法，其中包含用于将消息路由到记录器的提交 ID。The logger is passed to the `MuxLogger.RegisterLogger` method with a submission ID that is used to route a message to that logger. 2. 将 `MuxLogger` 记录器注册到 `MuxLogger` 事件源。The `MuxLogger` registers the logger to the `MuxLogger` event source. 3. 如果已记录生成已启动的事件，则 `MuxLogger` 会创建一个新的生成启动事件，并将其发送到记录器的事件源。If the build-started event has already been logged, the `MuxLogger` creates a new build-started event and sends it to the logger's event source. `MuxLogger`注销记录器的方法如下：The `MuxLogger` unregisters loggers in the following way: 1. 完成生成提交后，将 `MuxLogger.UnregisterLogger` 使用记录器的提交 ID 调用方法。When a build submission is completed, the `MuxLogger.UnregisterLogger` method is called with the submission ID for the logger. 2. 将 `MuxLogger` 查找提交 ID 的项目完成事件的成功状态，并将生成结束事件记录到记录器。The `MuxLogger` looks up the success state of the project-finished event for the submission ID and logs a build-finished event to the logger. 3. `MuxLogger`清理事件源。The `MuxLogger` cleans up the event source. 请注意，取消注册来自记录线程以外的线程，如果在记录事件时调用了 "取消注册"，则可能会出现同步问题。Note that the unregister comes from a thread other than the logging thread and a synchronization issue could occur if unregister is called while events are being logged.

summary.span: 此方法将在 MUX 记录器上注册记录器，并在已记录生成已启动事件时引发生成开始事件

span.span: This method will register a logger on the MUX logger and then raise a build started event if the build started event has already been logged
